resources.string: Options for status bar battery style
Show battery level for the currently connected BT headset, if available.
Color range used on dark status bar
Color range used on light status bar
Charging color used on dark status bar
Charging color used on light status bar
Open quick settings when there are %1$s
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Show the music track title as the QS tile title
Allow scrolling through the small QS tiles
Quick QS tile columns follow QS panel tile column number
Enable to show QS tile titles
Select an image to use for static mode
When using swipe up home navigation to open recents, only stock recents are supported
Clear recents by long-pressing the memory bar
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Image to show when no recent apps
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Apps to not show in the panel
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Configure the content of the app sidebar
Change the look of the sidebar
Reduce recents opening lag by disabling this
Double tap to sleep on lockscreen to sleep device
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Allow accessing power menu on secure lock screen
Disable quick settings tiles on secure lockscreen
Vibrate on successful fingerprint authentication enabled
Vibrate on successful fingerprint authentication disabled
Add On-The-Go toggle to Power Menu
Add Screenrecord toggle to Power Menu
Swap volume buttons based on device rotation
Keys control media slider by default. Enable to switch to ring tone slider
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks. Will disable wake control below
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Long press power button for torch
Toggles torch when power button is long pressed while display is off
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Select custom bootanimation. On every change, the current animation will be backed up to the AICP_backup folder in your internal storage. Old ones must be deleted manually if not needed.
No application found to pick the zip file. Please install a filemanager.
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk.
Restore the above set sepolicy mode on each boot
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Be patient for the logs to be created
Customize the look and behaviour of Aicp Extras
Launcher icon visibility updated. It might take some time for the change to take effect
Visit our gerrit to know what we are working on
View recent changes made to AICP
Visit the AICP download page for your device
For more functionality, root your device
For all changes to take effect, a SystemUI restart is required. Restart SystemUI now?
Action failed because of missing superuser access
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery.
Notification preview in status bar instead of heads up

Navigation bar must be disabled!

Available gestures:

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Long press home
- Short swipe up and hold in the center

Use bottom swipe up gestures for navigation
Navigation bar must be disabled!

Available gestures:

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Long press home
- Short swipe up and hold in the center
Toggle to enable onscreen navigation bar
Places navigation bar on left side of screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
A unique and fully customizable gesture-based navigation bar
Back and Home must always be set. To change Back or Home assignments, set the desired assignment first.\n\nEnabling double-tap actions produces a slight delay with single-tap responsiveness.
Setting actions to only right/left will split touch areas amongst entire bar.
Threshold tuning is based on width/height percentage of Fling interface area
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Adjust the time threshold for executing long-press actions
Double-tap left/right actions become left/right keyboard cursor actions when keyboard is visible
Are you sure you want to reset Fling to stock settings?
Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Used also as fallback for automatic color
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Sync color with album arts. Overrides Lava Lamp and lines opacity.

Long-pressing any button brings up edit menu. A short hold on any button initiates a drag and drop button sorting option.\n\nEnabling double-tap actions produces a slight delay to single-tap responsiveness.
Set the position of contextual buttons (menu, ime selector, etc.)
Set animation style of primary buttons when pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Choose which buttons to display with on-screen keyboard and while music playing
Allow swiping on navigation bar to enable one-handed mode
Double-tap on empty navbar areas to sleep
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of minutes to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of minutes to wait before performing actions after screen on

Displays playing music track info within Ambient display screen.

It's triggered also if Ambient Display is disabled when a new track is started, forcing a clean ambient screen with track info in the middle of the screen.

You can also double tap on track info to skip track.
Off to supress/on to enable to play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Configure the behaviour of the device\'s hardware buttons
Enable to use volume keys for cursor control
Use volume rocker to wake screen when off. Will disable playback control above
Toggle to enable/disable button backlight on hardware keys
Left edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Right edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
This is test for selected toast animation
By default, preferences that will probably not work well on your device (because of e.g. root status or display cutout) will not be shown
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Play the notification sound of each app only once per set time period
